RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 14 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 14 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Fo als Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORE MUCHO prompted the pace three wide, gained a narrow lead at the quarter pole, dug in gamely under left handed urging when challenged by the winner and proved best under a strong hand ride. TIME FOR CUPID never far back, loomed boldly four wide into the stretch, matched strides the balance of the trip and couldn't handle the winner. MAY BEAU trailed down the backstretch and had a mild rally through the stretch in the six path. O K BABY stalked the early pace along the rail, offered a strong bid nearing the quarter pole then came up empty. DREAM MUSIC set the pace in the two path for nearly a half then weakened. SURPRISED GEM had good early speed then faded. FALL CAMPAIGN was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Dream Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2path turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Surprised Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Time for Cupid
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, loomed boldly 4 wide top lane, just missed

ENTRY.NAME: O K Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, bid rail 1/4 pole, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: More Mucho
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed, took over 3 wide 1/4p, dug in left urging, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: May Beau
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, mild rally 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Fall Campaign
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 18300. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 14 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 14 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WORTHY OPPONENT away alertly, took charge leaving the chute, set all the pace, widened into the stretch and prevailed under brisk handling. ACCURATE broke sharply, chased the winner three wide, drifted to the six path entering the stretch giving up ground then was steadily gaining late. TIDE RISING went evenly. NOTHINLASTSFOREVER stalked the early pace along the inside and was through after a half. SERENDIPITOUS trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Nothinlastsforever
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Tide Rising
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Worthy Opponent
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drew clear upper stretch, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Serendipitous
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Accurate
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, chased, 3 wide, second best, 6path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 49. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FEELING EASY prompted the pace two wide through the turn, made the lead at the quarter pole, set the balance of the pace and drew off late under right handed urging. MAYBETHEONE stalked the pace along the inside, rallied two wide into the stretch, drifted to the four path in deep stretch and got up for second. MIZ KEETA hit the gate when the doors opened, moved up three wide into the stretch in the five path then was outfinished. AUTHORITARIAN GIRL went evenly. NANCYFROMTHEBLOCK was no threat. WILD MARIAH away alertly, set pace the pace along the inside to teh quarter pole then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Maybetheone
ENTRY.OWNER: Sparks Jerry S and Lopez Juana
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, rallied 2path, drifted 4path, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Nancyfromtheblock
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Mariah
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, 1/4 pole, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Feeling Easy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, assumed command 1/4 pole, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Miz Keeta
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate start, middle move, 3 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Authoritarian Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: McDonald James H and Authentic Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 14 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 14 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GUN LAP drifted in bumping MURTAUGH at the start, prompted the pace three wide into the turn, made the lead nearing the five sixteenths marker, edged clear into the stretch and won under right handed urging. EL ROSILLO had good early speed two wide, dropped back before the turn, shifted outside then came in again late four wide. NINETIES COUNTRY trailed early and had a mild late rally three wide. MASTER broke in front, set a pressured pace along the inside into the turn then was outfinished. MURTAGH was bumped at the start, prompted the pace three then two wide into the stretch then weakened. THE EQUINEST had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: The Equinest
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Master
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace turn, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: El Rosillo
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 2 wide, dropped back turn, came again 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Nineties Country
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, mild rally late 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Murtagh
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed 3-2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Gun Lap
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted in, bumped start, rallied 3 wide turn, edged clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 14. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ISTILLGOTIT broke inward bumping RED COMET at the start, sprinted to the lead in the four path late on the first turn, dropped inside, set the pace down the backstretch, gave up the advantage nearing the far turn, regained the lead in upper stretch and proved best under confident handling. VENETIAN DREAM alternated in setting and pressing the pace and finished second best two wide. OWN THE TOWN never far back, was steadily gaining ground late three wide. YOUVESAIDITALL was bumped at the start, stalked the pace along the inside and went evenly. FORT RAMSEY stalked the pace two wide into the stretch then gave way. OPEN OUT was no factor. ACESKINGSANQUEENS was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Youvesaiditall
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, stalked inside, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Istillgotit
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, rushed to lead 4path, headed far turn, came again,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Fred W. Hertrich III & John D. Fielding

ENTRY.NAME: Fort Ramsey
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 2 wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Open Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Aceskingsanqueens
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Own the Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late gain 3 wide, good effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Venetian Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead, chased, took over 3/8 pole 2 wide, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 70. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 14 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 14 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WILDCAT EXPRESS away alertly, gave up the lead briefly, regained control soon after the start, set a rapid pace and widened through the stretch under left handed urging to win as much the best. SWING STATE allowed to settle, had a mild late rally two wide and got up for second. KID RUSSELL stalked the early pace, moved up inside rivals on the turn then was narrowly outfinished for second. FAST CLIP had a brief early lead, chased the winner off the rail in the four path and faded in the stretch. RED COMET failed to menace. YOU'RE OUT trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Kid Russell
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, outfinished for second

ENTRY.NAME: Red Comet
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Clip
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief early lead inside, chased, 2 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: You're Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Swing State
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, mild rally, 2 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcat Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set fast pace, drew off, much the best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 56. Claiming Purse 18300. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 14 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 14 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,50 0.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TALE OF THE LYON broke outward bumping CAN I GO TOO at the start forcing that one into RONNI'S DAY, quickly made the lead, set a pressured pace into the stretch and drew off under right handed urging in the three path. COSTUME JEWELRY never far back, rallied through the stretch in the five path and got up for second. CAN I GO TOO was bumped between horses at the start, advanced steadily along the inside into the stretch then was outfinished. BAREFOOT BEACH had good early speed four wide then faded. ST PATTY'S SONG was no threat. PROPER ETIQUETTE pressured the winner three then two wide and was through after a half. RONNI'S DAY was bumped at the start, pressed the early pace two wide, retreated before the turn and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Tale of the Lyon
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward bumped start, set pressured pace, drew off,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Paul W. Schaffer, William D. Pickerrell& Pick View LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Can I Go Too
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped between horses start, inside bid, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Ronni's Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed 2 wide, through early, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Proper Etiquette
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3-2wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Barefoot Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, 4 wide, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Costume Jewelry
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied 5path, up place

ENTRY.NAME: St Patty's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 72. Allowance Purse 38400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners OfA Race S ince July 14 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 14 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADY LOTTIE broke sharply then drifted out, set all the pace and widened through the stretch under a strong hand ride to win as much the best. CROSSED UP was in tight at the start, rallied late two wide and finished best. OUT MY DEAR in tight at the start, stalked the pace outside and finished with good courage four wide. CHANEL SPIRIT drifted in at the start, chased the winner two wide and was outfinished three wide. HELLO SWEETS in tight at the start, offered a mild bid along the inside into the stretch then was outfinished. SPICE ICE was in tight at the start and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Lottie
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out start, led throughout, drew off, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Hello Sweets
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, middle move, inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Out My Dear
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, stalked pace, finished well, 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Crossed Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, late rally, 2 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Spice Ice
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Chanel Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted in start, chased, 2 wide, outfinished 3 wide,
